channel.title: Help adding a trade log
channel.description:
hi basically im having a few issues with some people trading items from account to account to hide them i was wondering is there any way to make a so that once a trade window is closed its writes it to a log with the item and quantity, from and to who.
if you could help it would be much appreciated
thanks <3 ilixoxili
